AngularJS.use: easily injecting dynamic data into HTML
AngularJS.keywords: Angular DOM HTML MVC structure structural data injection server
features: Synchronize data between JS (back-end) and HTML (front-end)
Services for AJAX, animation, asynchronicity, and many more

JSHint.use: finding potential errors and problems in JavaScript code
JSHint.types: web program, Node plugin, Rhino plugin, text editor plugin
JSHint.keywords: online lint linting clean cleaning scan syntax error bug mistake problem quality style
features: Disable one, multiple, or all errors for a single file or section of code
Detect potential typos in logical operators

JSLint.use: detecting errors and potential problems in JavaScript code
JSLint.keywords: online lint linting clean cleaning scan syntax error bug mistake problem quality style
features: Detect unused, undeclared, redeclared, or post-declared variables
Detect unsafe chars, tabs, and messy whitespace
